items.summary:
Labor Day 2025 has officially arrived, and while there have been a serious number of notable price drops on Apple gear for over a week now, much of the best of them are still kicking today. The return of all-time low pricing across most M3 iPad Air models continues at $150 off alongside $100 price drops on iPad mini 7 and up to $200 off M4 iPad Pro. Those deals also join ongoing offers on M4 MacBook Air and M4 MacBook Pro at $200 and $300 off, respectively, as well as AirPods 4 at very close to the best price ever and a series of iPhone 15/16 Pro deals as well.

items.summary:
It’s been an exciting summer for LEGO, as we’ve seen massive waves of new building sets release over the last few months with regular unveilings of new sets happening in between. Following the 107 new releases we saw hit the scene last month, September is geared up to be a much smaller event, though one stacked with plenty of standouts that already have builders champing at the bits – with some already available to preorder too. Of course, there are four different Gift With Purchase rewards that will be popping up for Harry Potter and the recently revealed Pirates of the Caribbean sets. You can get the full rundown below and start planning (or preordering) what will be joining your collection once the clock ticks over to September.

items.title: Never lose your wallet again with the KeySmart SmartCard Lite, now down as low as $16 each
items.summary:
Apple AirTags promised to make keeping track of everything easier. I thought they would be the ultimate high tech tracker. But then they launched and … I’m disappointed. They’re clunky, expensive, and only last a few months. While they’re great for suitcases, bags, and even keys (when attached to a keyring). But when it comes to keeping track of your cards, wallet, and badges, they leave a lot to be desired. The spherical devices don’t fit inside a phone case, a stylish wallet, or in your jean pockets. But you don’t have to worry about unsightly bulging trackers anymore. Enter: the KeySmart SmartCard Lite.

more…

Alongside thousands of discounts on Apple gear, the Pixel 10 pre-orders, kitchen products, smartphone accessories of all sorts, and a whole lot more, the holiday weekend is also delivering discounts across Amazon’s in-house tech lineup, including Echo smart speakers and the smart home hub, all of its latest Fire tablets, the new Kindle Colorsoft model, Fire TV Stick, Blink smart home gear, and that’s just for starters. All of the best Amazon Labor Day deals are waiting on this page, and we have detailed the most notable offers on its in-house tech offerings down below.

items.title: A look at the potential future of personalized, AI-generated entertainment, and how it could both submerge human originality and enable new forms of expression (Joshua Rothman/New Yorker)
items.summary:
Joshua Rothman / New Yorker:
A look at the potential future of personalized, AI-generated entertainment, and how it could both submerge human originality and enable new forms of expression  —  We're used to algorithms guiding our choices.  When machines can effortlessly generate the content we consume, though, what's left for the human imagination?

items.title: Cambridge, UK-based Paragraf, which makes graphene-based electronics using standard semiconductor processes, raised a $55M Series C to scale its manufacturing (Tamara Djurickovic/Tech.eu)
items.summary:
Tamara Djurickovic / Tech.eu:
Cambridge, UK-based Paragraf, which makes graphene-based electronics using standard semiconductor processes, raised a $55M Series C to scale its manufacturing  —  Paragraf pioneers graphene-based electronics with standard semiconductor processes, producing magnetic sensors and GMS while developing advanced devices.
